tr.td: Juniata wins toss; elects to receive
Nick Campbell kickoff 55 yards to the JUN10, DaVon Mitchell return 12 yards to the JUN22 (Garrett Spek; Andy Laychur).
clock 14:54, Ward Udinski rush for 2 yards to the JUN24 (Chris Ibrahim).
clock 14:13, Zach McCaulley rush for 3 yards to the JUN27 (Hani Annabi).
clock 13:35, Ward Udinski pass incomplete to Colton Myers.
